/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, teeming with cars and buses, stretches out into the distance, flanked by buildings on both sides. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with a few clouds. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the blue of the sky and the green of the trees standing out against the more muted tones of the buildings and vehicles.
